Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.parser.Loader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BanLoader, BonusBarLoader, CardLoader, ConversionLoader, FaithPathLoader, ImageLoader, LeaderCardLoader, PositionLoader, TimerLoader

    public abstract class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for a generic loader from a json File
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
